name: Mega Fruit
overview: You have just arrived in Vegas and head straight for the biggest casino in town. You are intent on spending every penny you have on the roulette wheel, but as you are passing through the foyer, you notice a strange Fruit Machine in the corner. The name of the Machine is "MEGA FRUIT" and as you have 15 minutes to spare you decide to have a few goes, after all a Fruit Machine never hurt anyone, well that's what you think, for this is the most addictive Gambling machine in the World, it will either make or break you. You want to leave but you can't, your hand seems automatic as you dig deep into your pocket searching for more change to deposit into the ever hungry "MEGA FRUIT". You are at your wits end, this machine is so frustrating. Will you go bust or will you clean up! Only you can tell when you play Mega Fruit the Ultimate fruit machine.
